title: Sepultura - 1991 - Arise (Rough Mixes Limited Edition For Rock I
description:
A1. Arise 
A2. Dead Embryonic Cells 
A3. Desperate Cry 
A4. Murder 
A5. Subtraction 
B1. Altered State 
B2. Under Siege (Regnum Irae) 
B3. Meaningless Movements 
B4. Infected Voice


This record was issued before the official release of "Arise" as Sepultura played on the "Rock in Rio" festival. EstÃƒÂºdio Eldorado couldn't wait until the record was complete and released this record for the Brazilian market only. It has alternative artwork which was also used on the "Under Siege" single. It's basically an excerpt of the upper part of the full artwork. 

It comprises the Scott Burns rough mix of the album opposed to the final mix by Andy Wallace. Some songs also lack overdubs which appeared on the final mix. 

Recorded and mixed at Morrisound Recording, Tampa, FL.
